content: adorn your tree with the easiest crochet ornaments featuring the beloved granny square even better red heart granny square all in one yarn changes colors for you to create perfect 6 squares every time practice double_crochet chain and simple assembly techniques we give you 2 different motifs to choose from one ball makes 14 ornaments that you can use to decorate gift boxes add a personal touch to wreaths or even string into garlands materials red heart® granny square all in one™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m soft white pink punch 2001 1 ball note 1 ball will make 14 ornaments measurement approx 6 15 cm high excluding stem
